roleset.name: be left behind

role.descr: benefactive, entity who gets the remainder

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to remain.01. Remain.01 is a member of VN class exist-47.1-1. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Be careful, this frame has no arg 0
example.text: The remaining of the mucosa in the ascending colon and cecum
example.arg: in the ascending colon and cecum
